articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Congratulates French President-elect
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Congratulates French President-elect
 Pyongyang, May 9 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, in a message on Monday congratulated Emmanuel Macron upon his election as French president.
					 Expressing belief that development of the bilateral relations would meet the interests common to the peoples of the two countries, Kim wished the president-elect success in his responsible work for development and prosperity of France.

articles.title: Europe Day Marked
articles.content:
Europe Day Marked
 Pyongyang, May 9 (KCNA) -- Thomas Schaefer, German ambassador to the DPRK, and Krzysztof Ciebien, Polish ambassador to the DPRK, jointly hosted a reception on Tuesday to mark Europe Day.
					 Present there on invitation were Kim Son Gyong, director-general of the European Department 2, and other officials of the DPRK Foreign Ministry and diplomatic envoys of different countries and representatives of international bodies here.
					
					 At the reception diplomatic envoys hoped that the situation on the Korean peninsula would be defused and peaceful solution would be provided through dialogue and negotiations.
					
					 The reception proceeded in a friendly atmosphere.

articles.title: Opening Ceremony of Building No. 3 of Kim Il Sung University
articles.content:
Opening Ceremony of Building No. 3 of Kim Il Sung University
 Pyongyang, May 9 (KCNA) -- Building No. 3 of Kim Il Sung University was successfully built in the area of Ryongnam Hill.
					 It has been equipped with multi-functional education facilities and experimental apparatuses. There is a playground outside the building which has service facilities and others.
					
					 An opening ceremony of the building took place on Tuesday.
					
					 Present there were Choe Tong Myong, department director of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea; Kim Sung Du, chairman of the Education Commission; Cha Hui Rim, chairman of the Pyongyang City People's Committee; and officials, teaching staff and students of the university.
					
					 Thae Hyong Chol, president of Kim Il Sung University and minister of Higher Education, made a report which was followed by speeches. 
					
					 The reporter and speakers expressed their will to develop Kim Il Sung University into the revolutionary university of the great leaders training able men strong in idea and faith and the world-class university leading the building of a socialist power.
					
					 At the end of the ceremony the participants went round the building and inspected a class at work.

articles.title: May 21 Architecture Festival Opens
articles.content:
May 21 Architecture Festival Opens
 Pyongyang, May 9 (KCNA) -- The 17th May 21 Architecture Festival opened.
					 The festival on the theme of "Juche-based Architecture Improving by Dint of Self-Development" will showcase more than 260 architecture designs, 260 finishing building materials and furniture, 20 IT-based design programs and 30-odd kinds of construction equipment and tools selected in provincial festivals and hear more than 250 scientific papers dealing with construction.
					
					 An opening ceremony took place at the Sci-Tech Complex on Tuesday.
					
					 Attending it were O Su Yong, vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, officials concerned, architects, technicians, teachers and researchers.

articles.title: Russian Embassy Officials Lay Wreaths before Liberation Tower
articles.content:
Russian Embassy Officials Lay Wreaths before Liberation Tower
 Pyongyang, May 9 (KCNA) -- Officials of the Russian embassy here laid a wreath before the Liberation Tower on Tuesday on the occasion of the 72nd anniversary of Russia's victory in the great Patriotic War.
					 Present at a wreath-laying ceremony were Ambassador Alexandr Matsegora and officials of the Russian embassy and diplomatic envoys and military attaches of foreign embassies here.
					
					 A wreath in the name of the Russian embassy was placed and the participants observed a moment's silence in memory of the fallen fighters of the Soviet Army.
					
					 The embassy officials also laid a wreath and bouquets at the cemetery of fallen fighters of the Soviet Army in Sadong District of Pyongyang.
					
					 Earlier, they placed bouquets before the liberation towers, statues of Soviet soldiers, cemeteries of fallen Soviet soldiers and memorial towers for them in provinces.
					
					 Meanwhile, the members of the Russian consulate general in Chongjin laid bouquets at the cemetery of fallen fighters of the Soviet Army in Chongjin City.

articles.title: UN Official Leaves
articles.content:
UN Official Leaves
 Pyongyang, May 9 (KCNA) -- Catalina Devandas Aguilar, UN special rapporteur on the Rights of Persons with Disabilities, and her party left here on Tuesday.

articles.title: Syrian Sports Delegation Leaves
articles.content:
Syrian Sports Delegation Leaves
 Pyongyang, May 9 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Syrian General Sports Union led by Chairman Mowaffak Twfiek Jounaa left here for home on Tuesday.

articles.title: Accomplices in Heinous State-sponsored Terrorism Will Have No Room to Live: DPRK Citizens
articles.content:
Accomplices in Heinous State-sponsored Terrorism Will Have No Room to Live: DPRK Citizens
 Pyongyang, May 9 (KCNA) -- People in the DPRK are infuriated by the recent statement released by the Ministry of State Security of the DPRK that the Central Intelligence Agency (CIA) of the U.S. and the south Korean Intelligence Service (IS) hatched a plot to commit state-sponsored terrorism against the supreme leadership of the DPRK by use of bio-chemical substance.
					 Workers of the Kim Jong Thae Electric Locomotive Complex, when interviewed by KCNA, expressed their anger at the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet group of traitors, who hatched a plot to commit a bomb terrorism targeting the supreme leadership of the DPRK during the event at the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun and the military parade and public procession, as follows:
					
					 Sin Sun Thae, head of a workshop:
					
					 The recent hideous crime was not just as an act of encroachment on the security and sovereignty of the state that can be committed by dishonest hostile forces.
					
					 The recent case was the most vicious challenge and the declaration of a war aimed to hurt the mental mainstay that all the Korean people absolutely trust and repose and to eclipse the eternal sun of the DPRK.
					
					 It is as clear as noonday that such heinous crime targeting the supreme headquarters of the Korean revolution would continue to be attempted, as long as the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet group of traitors remain unchanged in their hostile policy toward the DPRK and there are CIA and IS running amuck as a spearhead in executing the policy.
					
					 Son In Bom, head of a workshop:
					
					 It makes me grind my teeth with fury that the U.S. and the south Korean puppet group, not content with anti-DPRK war drills, hatched a dirty plot to dare hurt the supreme leadership which the Korean people regard dearer than their life.
					
					 We will ferry out those terrorist maniacs to the last one, who were engaged themselves in the plot to commit state-sponsored terrorism against the supreme leadership of the DPRK by use of bio-chemical substance, even by ransacking the whole earth and put them to death.
					
					 Pak Hung Chol, a worker:
					
					 I can hardly repress my indignation over the fact that the bloodthirsty felons gave terrorists more than 80 secret orders to hurt our supreme leadership. Now, all the workers of the complex are afire with revenge to catch and throw them all into furnace to death at any cost.

articles.title: Campaign for Increased Production Brisk in DPRK
articles.content:
Campaign for Increased Production Brisk in DPRK
 Pyongyang, May 9 (KCNA) -- The working classes in the DPRK are putting spurs to their struggle to carry out the first half-yearly and yearly quotas ahead of schedule this year, a year of key importance in implementing the five-year strategy for national economic development.
					 In April, the Ko Kyong Chan-led Hero Workteam of the April 5 Pit at the Kumgol Mine under the Komdok Mining Complex carried out its national economic plan for this year by 101.5 percent and was honored with a congratulatory message sent by respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 A campaign for creating Mallima speed is also gaining momentum in the Musan Mining Complex, a leading iron ore producer in the country.
					
					According to an official concerned, more than 10 workteams of the complex surpassed their first half-yearly quotas as of April 30, thus producing 100,000 more tons of iron ore, as compared with the same period of last year.
					
					 Workers of the Thermal Power Plant Construction Complex fulfilled their national economic plan for the first half of this year.
					
					 In the field of textile industry, more than 80 workers carried out their yearly economic plan and over 430 workers the first-half yearly plan.

articles.title: Making Selfless, Devoted Efforts for Good of People Is Revolutionary Climate of WPK
articles.content:
Making Selfless, Devoted Efforts for Good of People Is Revolutionary Climate of WPK
 Pyongyang, May 9 (KCNA) -- It has been a year since the election of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un as chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) in the DPRK.
					 On this occasion, the DPRK people extend warm gratitude to the WPK for working miracles in the spirit of making selfless, devoted efforts for the good of the people.
					
					 The spirit of making selfless, devoted efforts for the good of the people is the most vivid expression of Kim Jong Un's love for the people.
					
					 What the DPRK people are keeping deep in their mind is a pride that as they uphold Kim Jong Un, who is making a ceaseless journey for the people, as the chairman of the WPK, the dignity and might of the WPK and its revolutionary climate and power of execution are further demonstrated.
					
					 Last year, the major thrust of the 200-day campaign was diverted to the recovery campaign in the flood-hit northern part of North Hamgyong Province under his leadership. Thanks to his wise leadership and the might of the single-hearted unity of the entire party, the whole army and all the people, the disaster areas were turned into the fairy land of the WPK era in a little over two months. And the construction of Ryomyong Street came to a perfect end in one year after its groundbreaking, though the country was hard pressed with the recovery campaign.
					
					 Kim Jong Un, in his concluding speech made at the 1st Conference of Chairpersons of the Primary Committees of the WPK held in December last year, said that chairpersons of the primary committees of the WPK should grasp our Party's noble view on the people, philosophy of the people, and become true servants loyal to the people and overcautious mother making selfless, devoted efforts for the good of the people.
					
					 Recalling his words, the DPRK people are fully convinced that such sacred revolutionary climate of the WPK will shine forever as a treasured sword for the victory of Juche Korea.
					
					 Therefore, the DPRK people are absolutely believing in and following the respected Supreme Leader, entrusting their all to him.

articles.title: KCNA Issues Report on Epochal Advance in Building Socialist Power
articles.content:
KCNA Issues Report on Epochal Advance in Building Socialist Power
 Pyongyang, May 9 (KCNA) -- The Korean Central News Agency released a report on Monday on the epochal advance made in the drive for building a socialist power during the past one year since the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The report says:
					
					 The past one year proved once again the validity of the strategic line set forth at the Seventh Congress of the WPK and the truth that Korean-style socialism is invincible.
					
					 The Korean army and people have achieved miraculous successes in the drive for building a socialist power during the past one year.
					
					 The political and ideological position of the Korean revolution was firmly consolidated through the struggle for modeling the whole society on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism which the Party Congress set forth, and the loyalty of the Korean army and people to hold the Party and the leader was fully displayed.
					
					 A statue of leader Kim Jong Il was erected in Samjiyon County, Ryanggang Province.
					
					 Mosaics depicting the portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and their images were erected at many units across the country and the Korean Revolution Museum was successfully remodeled.
					
					 The military might of the DPRK with the nuclear force as a pivot was bolstered up in every way under the outstanding Songun guidance of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Test-fires of ground to ground medium-and-long range strategic ballistic rocket Hwasong-10, new strategic weapon, and of strategic submarine ballistic missile successfully took place. Preparations for the test-fire of inter-continental ballistic rocket reached the final stage. These eye-opening events witnessed one after another in bolstering up the national defence capabilities.
					
					 The general offensive to hasten the building of an economic power was dynamically waged and the 200-day campaign of loyalty to make a breakthrough in carrying out the five-year strategy for national economic development was declared.
					
					 Manpower and material and technical potentials of the country were all mobilized and concentrated to recover the unprecedentedly flood-hit northern parts of North Hamgyong Province and vast targets were hit on each front of the 200-day campaign.
					
					 Service personnel and builders built Ryomyong Street in a matter of just one year.
					
					 Scientists and technicians succeeded in the ground jet test of new type high-thrust engine for a geo-stationary satellite carrier rocket.
					
					 In the field of science and technology lots of scientific and technological problems were solved including the establishment of Korean-style unmanned model production system and completion of the technology of producing electrode for UHP electric arc furnace.
					
					 Successes were also achieved in the fields of metal, chemistry, agriculture, light industry, fishery, construction, education and public health.
					
					 The proud reality of the DPRK dashing ahead towards the eminence of a powerful socialist country proved in practice the iron-willed truth that nobody can block the advance of the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean people who are turning out in a general do-or-die campaign.

articles.title: WPK's Determination Means Science and Shining Practice: DPRK Papers
articles.content:
WPK's Determination Means Science and Shining Practice: DPRK Papers
 Pyongyang, May 9 (KCNA) -- Leading newspapers of the DPRK Tuesday carry editorials on the lapse of one year since the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea was successfully held.
					 Rodong Sinmun says that the army and people of the DPRK have more deeply cherished in their mind the precious philosophical principle of life and struggle in the course of bringing eye-opening events and gigantic reforms under the blueprint unfolded at the 7th WPK Congress, with high pride and honor of holding in high esteem respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un as chairman of the WPK.
					
					 His idea and leadership serve as the banner of eternal victory of the WPK, the Korean revolution and Korean-style socialism. This is an immutable truth cherished by the army and people of the DPRK in the past struggle of one year, the paper stresses, and goes on:
					
					 Thanks to his Songun leadership, great victories and reforms of weighty significance in the history of the nation have been made in the overall revolution and construction over the past one year. Victories and new heroic legendary tales and shining labor feats were created one after another at the sites of the 200-day campaign, and the scientific accuracy and invincibility of Korean-style socialism were displayed to the full along with the might of the single-minded unity of the leader, the party and the masses, the national defence capabilities based on the nuclear force and self-reliance and self-development.
					
					 Events celebrating the 105th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung were held with splendor as a great political festival to be recorded in the history of the country, and the country's sovereignty and dignity and the peace and security of the Korean peninsula and the region were reliably preserved despite the danger of an imminent nuclear war from the U.S. imperialists and their vassal forces. This would have been unthinkable without the tested leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The last struggle of one year for implementation of the decision of the 7th WPK Congress goes to clearly prove the greatness of Kim Jong Un's idea and leadership and the invincibility of the revolutionary cause of Juche, the cause of building a socialist power.
					
					 The WPK's determination means science and shining practice. This is the faith that the army and people of the DPRK have more deeply cherished in their mind through the gigantic struggle of last one year.
					
					 Minju Joson says that a series of miraculous events last year and this year are a clear proof of the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Papers Deride Trump Administration's Ambition to Pressurize DPRK
articles.content:
Papers Deride Trump Administration's Ambition to Pressurize DPRK
Pyongyang, May 9 (KCNA) -- U.S. President Trump during his recent interview with Reuters bluffed that there is certainly a possibility of a big conflict with the DPRK and he maintains the option of military strike at it.
					 Meanwhile, U.S. Secretary of State Tillerson, at a ministerial meeting of the UN Security Council called for tightening economic and diplomatic pressure on the DPRK to make it scrap nuclear program. And he told that to this end each country has to cut off or downgrade the level of diplomatic relations with the DPRK and further the implementation of the sanctions on it.
					
					 This rubbish of half pressure and half admonition nature is a useless act of those who have lost self-control, being seized by the vaulting ambition of stifling the DPRK, notes Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in a commentary, which says:
					
					 The Trump group is going reckless without reason even though they do not have full understanding of how the world goes about, what kind of rival it stands against and how invincible might the rival has.
					
					 The DPRK already declared it would not rule out any special option in order to defend the peace on the Korean peninsula and the region.
					
					 It is its pluck and stamina to answer an all-out war in kind and a nuclear war with powerful nuclear strike of Korean-style. Preemptive attack is no longer the monopoly of the U.S.
					
					 If the U.S. makes even a slightest provocation to the DPRK, the latter will mercilessly destroy the former with preemptive strike of its own style and achieve the great cause of national reunification.
					
					 Minju Joson commentary derides the Trump administration for coming out with the hackneyed suggestion not welcomed even by the Americans.

articles.title: S. Korean People Demand Liquidation of Conservative Forces
articles.content:
S. Korean People Demand Liquidation of Conservative Forces
 Pyongyang, May 9 (KCNA) -- The south Korean people spit at the sheer lies of the conservative forces, accomplices of bete noire Park Geun Hye, as they let her sit in Chongwadae and deteriorated the people's living and economy and perpetrated scams by engaging themselves only in the treacherous rule as her henchmen, Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says in an article.
					 Noting that the miserable situation in south Korea at present is an inevitable product of the traitorous politics and corrupt rule and incompetence of the puppet conservative regime, the article goes on:
					
					 The Park Geun Hye group is a group of thrice-cursed traitors who sought greed for power while living in luxury and comfort and pleasing outsiders, in utter disregard of the destiny of the country and the nation and people whom they regard as a tool for implementing their sinister political intent.
					
					 The conservative group brought to the south Korean people the worst era of misfortune and distress, not "era of people's happiness".
					
					 The economy of south Korea has been driven to bitterer catastrophe owing to the Park Geun Hye group's heinous confrontation with the fellow countrymen in the north. 
					
					 A shortcut to new politics, new life and new society in south Korea is to liquidate the conservative group which reduced it into a great prison, hell of horror and disaster by pursuing the anti-social treacherous rule and committed unpardonable crimes.
					
					 Not only Park Geun Hye and a few specific criminals but also all other conservatives, the nest of treachery, misrule and scandals, should be buried in the grave of history. This is the demand of the south Korean public.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Terms Key Resolve, Foal Eagle Test Nuclear War
articles.content:
odong Sinmun Terms Key Resolve, Foal Eagle Test Nuclear War
 Pyongyang, May 9 (KCNA) -- Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military drills were the largest-ever provocative preliminary war and test nuclear war in its scale and nature, contents and form, says Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in an article.
					 Noting the war rehearsals clearly proved that the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK is getting vicious and the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces are wholly to blame for the increasing tensions and danger of nuclear war on the Korean peninsula, the article goes on:
					
					 Key Resolve and Foal Eagle showed that the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet military maniacs are resorting to gambling as their last-ditch efforts after being plunged into a real fix due to the complete flop of its hostile policy toward the DPRK and moves of confrontation with the compatriots in the north.
					
					 Though the war drumbeats allegedly came to an end, the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces persist in their reckless moves as they seek to provoke a nuclear war against the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. imperialist warmongers are stupidly overconfident of their might and the south Korean puppet forces are running amuck, blindly following the U.S. scheme for a DPRK-targeted nuclear war. Their reckless moves only harden the faith and will of the invincible revolutionary Paektusan army to mercilessly smash the provocation of the aggressors by dint of the nuclear deterrent of justice.
					
					 If the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces fire even a single bullet at the territory of the DPRK, the revolutionary forces will totally wipe out the bases of aggression and provocation and thus certainly realize the historic cause of national reunification.

articles.title: S. Korean Conservative Group's Solicitation Diplomacy Flailed
articles.content:
S. Korean Conservative Group's Solicitation Diplomacy Flailed
 Pyongyang, May 9 (KCNA) -- Traitor Yun Pyong Se, puppet foreign minister of south Korea, at the recent ministerial meeting of the UN Security Council in New York supported his masters' talk about "nuclear threat from the north" and called for "forcing the north to scrap its nuclear and missile program in a complete, verifiable and irrevocable way". He even spoke of taking "intolerably stronger punitive measure".
					 At a foreign ministerial meeting with his U.S. and Japan masters that followed, he solicited for cooperation for putting pressure on the DPRK, saying "it is important to maintain the basic principle of sanctions and pressure on the north".
					
					 Commenting on the fact, Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says this reveals the invariable intention of the south Korean group of conservatives to realize their ambition for "unification of social systems" while maintaining their dirty remaining days with the backing of outsiders.
					
					 Yun is a peerless traitor as he caused unprecedented "diplomatic disaster" while doing only thrice-cursed acts, typically the deployment of THAAD in south Korea and the shackling agreement on the issue of the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army, the daily notes, and goes on:
					
					 He, however, is soliciting the outsiders to help put pressure on the DPRK, while going with bloodshot eyes to escalate confrontation with the fellow countrymen. This mendicant diplomacy is a shame on the nation.
					
					 The traitor has to clearly understand that stern punishment awaits him who risked the nation's interests for the sake of the U.S. and Japanese masters while serving Park Geun Hye as her yes-man.
					
					 Minju Joson stresses that the south Korean group of traitors seeking to escalate confrontation between the north and the south and provoke a war of aggression on the north with the backing of outsiders can never evade stern punishment by the entire nation.

articles.title: Minju Joson Discloses Ulterior Purpose of Japan in Following U.S. Moves to Strike DPRK
articles.content:
Minju Joson Discloses Ulterior Purpose of Japan in Following U.S. Moves to Strike DPRK
Pyongyang, May 9 (KCNA) -- Japanese Prime Minister Abe, at a recent press conference held after a phone conversation with U.S. President Trump, highly appreciated Trump's policy that all options including military option are on the table to settle the Korean issue.
					Commenting on this, Minju Joson Tuesday says:
					
					What Abe uttered only revealed the ill-minded nature of the Japanese reactionaries wanting an earlier outbreak of war on the Korean peninsula.
					
					The Japanese reactionary regime is asking the U.S. to escalate the level of threat, flattering the U.S. seeking to strike the DPRK by force of arms. This is because such strong-arm policy of the U.S. is favorable to its criminal wild ambition.
					
					This year's May marks the 70th anniversary of the enforcement of the Pacifist Constitution in Japan. Now that the climate of security is getting serious in Northeast Asia, the Japanese reactionaries deem it a golden chance for making a breakthrough in its efforts to turn itself into a warring nation by modifying its old Pacifist Constitution.
					
					While disturbing the efforts for detente on the Korean peninsula, the Japanese regime is speeding up the preparatory work for modifying the constitution under the pretext of changing security climate.
					
					In another word, it is the sly calculation of Japan to retrogressively revise the present constitution by putting up the security crisis on the Korean peninsula as a pretext.
					
					The reactionary regime of Japan is finding a way out in deteriorating the situation on the Korean peninsula but it is no more than a stupid calculation of fools.
					
					Now is just the crucial time for Japan to be mindful of its existence, not to pursue the modification of the constitution.
					
					Japan is sadly mistaken if it thinks that the second Korean war would help it get windfall gain like in the past. On the contrary, Japan will have to face a downpour of nuclear strikes only.

articles.title: Anniversary of Russia's Victory in Great Patriotic War Marked
articles.content:
Anniversary of Russia's Victory in Great Patriotic War Marked
 Pyongyang, May 9 (KCNA) -- Leading newspapers of the DPRK on Tuesday dedicate articles to the 72nd anniversary of Russia's victory in the Great Patriotic War.
					 Rodong Sinmun says that the victory of Russia in the Great Patriotic War was a historic victory the Soviet Union won at the cost of blood, shouldering the major heavy burden of the World War unprecedented in history in which 80 percent of the world population was involved.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The Korean people extend congratulations and friendly greetings to the Russian people on the 72nd anniversary of the victory in the Great Patriotic War, hoping that everything would go well in Russia.
					
					 The DPRK-Russia friendship favors the interests of the two peoples and guarantees peace in the region.
					
					 The bilateral relations of friendship and cooperation will grow stronger thanks to the joint efforts of the two countries.
					
					 Minju Joson says that the Second World War, which imposed immeasurable misfortunes and sufferings upon mankind, was an aggressive and predatory war of fascist Germany and its allies to make all other peoples slaves and fascistize the whole world and, at the same time, an anti-fascist liberation war of the world democratic forces.

articles.title: S. Koreans to Launch Intensive No-THAAD Action
articles.content:
S. Koreans to Launch Intensive No-THAAD Action
 Pyongyang, May 9 (KCNA) -- Civic and social bodies and activists from across south Korea reportedly held a meeting for peace in Songju, North Kyongsang Province on May 4, where they announced an intensive No-THAAD action plan.
					 The participants of the meeting urged the next-term "government" to set the settlement of the issue of THAAD deployment as its top priority task and immediately clarify its stand against introduction and deployment of THAAD.
					
					 They called for probing truth behind the illegal introduction of THAAD and argument over the burden of its operation cost and punishing the very one responsible for it.
					
					 To this end, they decided to hold the second meeting in Seoul. And they said they would indict Kim Kwan Jin, Hwang Kyo An, Han Min Gu and Yun Pyong Se for power abuse and dereliction of duty.

articles.title: S. Korean Paper Denounces Japan's Pressure on UNESCO and Incompetent Regime
articles.content:
S. Korean Paper Denounces Japan's Pressure on UNESCO and Incompetent Regime
 Pyongyang, May 9 (KCNA) -- The south Korean paper Hankook Ilbo on Monday carried an editorial which denounced Japan's despicable pressure upon the UNESCO with regard to the issue of putting the data on sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army on the list of registration of world heritages and the south Korean regime's improper counteraction.
					 The editorial charged that the Japanese government is openly interfering with the work for putting the registration of the records on the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese army jointly promoted by civic organizations of various countries, but the south Korean regime remains passive onlooker to it. 
					
					 It stressed the need to bitterly denounce Japan's behavior, according to the surging rage of the people over the "agreement" with Japan on the sexual slavery, and build up world public opinion on it.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Introduced in Nepal
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Introduced in Nepal
 Pyongyang, May 9 (KCNA) -- The Nepalese newspaper Arpan on April 14 carried the full text of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Add Eternal Brilliance to Comrade Kim Jong Il's Great Idea and Achievements of the Songun Revolution".
					 The work, published on August 25, Juche 102 (2013), deals with the Songun revolutionary feats of leader Kim Jong Il and the essence and originality of the Songun revolutionary idea and indicates the tasks for successfully accomplishing the cause of the Songun revolution.
					
					 The paper carried a photo of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Letter Published in Uganda
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Letter Published in Uganda
 Pyongyang, May 9 (KCNA) -- The Ugandan National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea on April 13 brought out in pamphlet "On the Basic Tasks Facing Kim Il Sung University in the New Era of the Juche Revolution", a letter sent by respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un to the teaching staff and students of Kim Il Sung University on its 70th founding anniversary, to mark the Day of the Sun, the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: Swiss Bodies Support Korea's All Measures for Self-Defense
articles.content:
Swiss Bodies Support Korea's All Measures for Self-Defense
 Pyongyang, May 9 (KCNA) -- The Swiss Preparatory Committee for Gathering 2017-Praise to the Great Persons of Mt Paektu, the Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea made public a joint statement on May 1 in support of the statement issued by a spokesman for the DPRK Foreign Ministry to clarify the fixed will of the Korean army and people to reliably defend the peace and stability of the Korean peninsula and the world.
					 The joint statement said:
					
					 The standoff between the DPRK and the U.S. has lasted for over 50 years, but the U.S. moves for aggression on the DPRK have now reached the zenith as never before.
					
					 The present acute situation on the Korean peninsula proves once again that the U.S. is just the flag-bearer in invasion and war.
					
					 If the DPRK hadn't had access to nuclear weapons, the U.S. would have unhesitatingly conducted brutal acts of aggression against the DPRK as it did against other countries.
					
					 The present confrontation between the two countries has proved again the immutable truth that one should have strong power if one wants to survive the fierce storm of history with neither backup nor sympathies from anyone.
					
					 Now that the U.S. pursues the new policy toward the DPRK billed "maximum pressure and engagement", the DPRK will step up the building up of nuclear deterrent at the highest speed.
					
					 The DPRK's steps to beef up its nuclear forces will be taken in succession anytime and anywhere as determined by its supreme leadership.
					
					 We full support all the measures taken by the DPRK to defend itself.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita al presidente electo de Francia
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita al presidente electo de Francia
Pyongyang, 9 de mayo (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio ayer un mensaje de felicitacion al presidente electo de la Republica de Francia, Emmanuel Macron. 
					Convencido de que el desarrollo de relaciones entre los dos paises convendria a los intereses comunes de ambos pueblos, el remitente formulo votos por los exitos en las responsabilidades del destinatario para el desarrollo y la prosperidad del pais.

articles.title: Efectuado acto de apertura del edificio no. 3 de la Universidad Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Efectuado acto de apertura del edificio no. 3 de la Universidad Kim Il Sung
Pyongyang, 9 de mayo (ACNC) -- En la zona del monte Ryongnam, se construyo excelentemente el edificio no.3 de la Universidad Kim Il Sung.
					En el nuevo edificio hay todos los equipos docentes multifuncionales y de laboratorio.
					
					Tambien quedaron acondicionados en alto nivel el campo deportivo y las facilidades de servicios publicos, etc.
					
					Tuvo lugar el dia 9 el acto de inauguracion con la presencia del jefe de departamento del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Choe Tong Myong, el presidente del Comite de Educacion, Kim Sung Du, el presidente del Comite Popular de la Cuidad de Pyongyang, Cha Hui Rim, los funcionarios, profesores, empleados y estudiantes del plantel docente.
					
					Hubo el informe de Thae Hyong Chol, rector general de la Universidad Kim Il Sung y ministro de Educacion Superior, y discursos.
					
					Los oradores expresaron la decision de preparar la universidad como la revolucionaria de los grandes Lideres Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il, que forme a los fuertes en la idea y conviccion, y la de primera clase mundial que dirija al frente la construccion de potencia socialista.
					
					Acto seguido, los participantes recorrieron el edificio y asistieron a una leccion.

articles.title: Iniciado XVII Festival Arquitectonico 21 de Mayo
articles.content:
Iniciado XVII Festival Arquitectonico 21 de Mayo
Pyongyang, 9 de mayo (ACNC) -- Quedo inaugurado el XVII Festival Arquitectonico 21 de Mayo.
					En el marco del presente certamen titulado "Arquitectura del Juche que se desarrolla en el principio de autofortalecimiento", se exhibiran mas de 260 proyectos de diseno arquitectonico, mas de 260 materiales de construccion de acabado y moblaje, mas de 20 programas para la informatizacion de diseno y mas de 30 tipos de equipos y herramientas de construccion que fueron elegidos en los festivales efectuados en las provincias (o las ciudades directamente subordinadas al centro). 
					
					Y se daran a la publicidad mas de 250 disertaciones cientificas de la rama de construccion. 
					
					La ceremonia de inauguracion tuvo lugar el dia 9 en el Palacio de Ciencias y Tecnicas con la participacion del vicepresidente del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, O Su Yong, los funcionarios, arquitectos, tecnicos, profesores e investigadores de los sectores de diseno, ejecucion de obra, supervision y construccion y de las instituciones cientificas y docentes.

articles.title: Miembros de embajada rusa en RPDC rinden homenaje a martires rusos
articles.content:
Miembros de embajada rusa en RPDC rinden homenaje a martires rusos
Pyongyang, 9 de mayo (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 72o aniversario de la victoria en la Gran Guerra Patria de Rusia, los miembros de la embajada rusa depositaron el dia 9 las ofrendas florales ante el Monumento a la Liberacion en esta capital.
					En la ceremonia de homenaje participaron el embajador Alexandr Matsegora y otros miembros de la sede diplomatica rusa, los representantes diplomaticos y los agregados militares de varios paises, en la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					Tras depositar una ofrenda floral a nombre de la embajada rusa, ellos guardaron un momento de silencio en memoria de los militares de la Union Sovietica.
					
					El mismo dia, los miembros de la representacion diplomatica de Rusia colocaron una ofrenda y ramos florales ante la tumba de los martires del ejercito sovietico en el capitalino municipio de Sadong.
					
					Con anterioridad, ellos hicieron otro tanto ante los monumentos a la liberacion, las estatuas de bronce, tumbas y monumentos de recordacion a los martires del ejercito sovietico, en diferentes localidades del pais.
					
					Por otra parte, los miembros del Consulado General de Rusia en Chongjin visitaron la tumba de los martires del ejercito sovietico en la ciudad de Chongjin.

articles.title: ACNC enumera exitos logrados durante un ano despues de VII Congreso del PTC
articles.content:
ACNC enumera exitos logrados durante un ano despues de VII Congreso del PTC
Pyongyang, 9 de mayo (ACNC) -- La Agencia Central de Noticias de Corea hizo publica el dia 8 una informacion sobre el avance trascendental logrado en la lucha por construir potencia socialista durante un ano despues del VII Congreso del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
					La nota adelanta que un ano pasado comprobo una vez mas la justeza de la linea estrategica presentada por el VII Congreso del PTC y la invencibilidad del socialismo al estilo coreano.
					
					Durante ese tiempo, el ejercito y pueblo coreanos obtuvieron resultados milagrosos en la lucha por edificar una potencia socialista, destaca y prosigue:
					
					Se ha consolidado firmemente la trinchera ideo-politica de la Revolucion Coreana en medio de la campana para transformar toda la sociedad segun el Kimilsungismo-Kimjongilismo y se ha manifestado la fidelidad de los militares y civiles al Partido y al Lider.
					
					Se levanto una estatua de bronce del Dirigente Kim Jong Il en el distrito de Samjiyon de la provincia de Ryanggang.
					
					En muchas unidades del pais se han edificado los murales de mosaico con imagenes del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il y se ha remodelado perfectamente el Museo de la Revolucion Coreana.
					
					Bajo la sabia direccion mediante el Songun del Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un, se ha fortalecido por todos los medios la capacidad militar de la RPDC, centrada en las fuerzas armadas nucleares.
					
					Se realizaron con exito el lanzamiento de prueba de cohete balistico estrategico tierra-tierra de mediano y largo alcance Hwasong-10 y el de SLBM y llegaron a etapa final los preparativos para el ensayo de ICBM.
					
					Se reportaron asi de manera escalonada y multiple los acontecimientos loables para el incremento de la capacidad de defensa nacional.
					
					Se libro con dinamismo la ofensiva general para acelerar la construccion de potencia economica y se desarrollo la campana de 200 dias de fidelidad para abrir la brecha en el cumplimiento de la Estrategia Quinquenal para el desarrollo de la economia nacional.
					
					Mientras tanto, termino con exito la batalla sin precedentes para la reconstruccion de las zonas septentrionales de la provincia de Hamgyong del Norte (azotadas por el diluvio).
					
					En ella se movilizaron y se concentraron todas las potencialidades humanas, materiales y tecnicas del pais y se alcanzaron ambiciosas metas en todos los sectores de la campana de 200 dias.
					
					Los militares del EPC y constructores edificaron en un ano la avenida Ryomyong.
					
					Los cientificos y tecnicos lograron exitos en la prueba estatica de la reaccion del motor de gran capacidad para el nuevo cohete transportador del satelite geoestacionario de nuevo tipo.
					
					El sector de ciencias y tecnicas desarrollo los ejemplares sistemas de produccion automatizados y la tecnica de produccion de electrodo para el horno electrico UHP y resolvio muchos problemas cientifico-tecnicos.
					
					Se acumularon exitos tambien en los sectores de metalurgia, quimica, agricultura, industria ligera, pesqueria, construccion, ensenanza y salud publica.
					
					Por ultimo, la informacion subraya que la realidad orgullosa de la RPDC, que marcha hacia la cima de potencia socialista, comprueba la verdad filosofica de que nadie puede frenar el avance del Partido del Trabajo y el pueblo de Corea, levantados en la ofensiva general.
